snippet: After being bullied, having depression and worrying about being alone, Alba Ramos is realizing that she can learn the skills she needs to find a job.
abstract: Brooklyn Community Services, one of seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases fund, provides Alba Ramos with funds to buy DVDs that are helping her to improve her English-speaking skills.
lead_paragraph: After being bullied, having depression and worrying about being alone, Alba Ramos is realizing that she can learn the skills she needs to find a job.

headline.print_headline: Conquering Her Fears While Learning Job Skills and Moving Toward Independence
headline.main: Conquering Her Fears While Learning Job Skills and Moving Toward Independence

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
